main_definition: Anytime refers to at any given moment or whenever required, without specific restrictions.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Freely available and can be done at a convenient time for the individual.
meanings_and_examples.example: You can call me anytime; I'm always here to help.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Ready or capable of being used whenever needed.
meanings_and_examples.example: This software is designed to run on multiple platforms and can be utilized anytime, anywhere.

meanings_and_examples.definition: At any moment; at no particular time or place in the future.
meanings_and_examples.example: Feel free to reach out if you need assistance, we're here for you anytime.
